name: Siddhārtha’s golden city
description:
“Silence is... Emerging...
Because then, when we are
beyond, in body and spirit...
there is only absence and
light.” -- In this piece, Fulvio
and Jordan collaborate to
transmute timeless wisdom of
universal charity, into powerful
visual poetry. It envisions a
golden city of the future,
where forces of darkness and
light are in harmonious cosmic
balance.
